name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 10% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 12% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 14% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 16% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

description: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.
